body:

That is a quote from the movie 8 mile in one of Eminem's rap seqeuences.  I used one hard F b/c i was getting trolled by 4 ppl that were all friends IN tft, a fun game-mode and shocker...it got me upset.  If anything I dropped a hard F which is regret but going from a 10 game chat restriction (a long time ago) to a 14 day suspension is a bit of a stretch.  I was definitely toxic and I agree, but these kids legit live to troll and they are good at it sometimes and it pisses you off.  Bottom line is, I agree hard F is bad and that deserves a chat restriction.  Telling the kid to KYS might be worthy of a 3 day ban, but sorry this is kinda ridiculous that it's a 14 day suspension...oh and this is from one single game of toxicity not multiple.

Glad to know you proved to us that league punishment system still works for TFT.

And there is no 3 day ban in Riot's punishment systems (gosh, I can'tbelieve I have to say all that now instead of just LoL), there are 4 punishment tiers;

1. 10 game chat restrictions 
2. 25 game chat restriction 
3. 14-day ban
4. Permaban

Use of hate speech and encouraging others to harm themselves will skip punishment tiers. So be glad you didn't directly get permabanned from that game.

I cant even wrap my mind around how you got a restriction from this, all you did all game is flame with very intolerable behavior. It should have been a permban, and usually is for similar offenses.

Next time you do anything against the rules you will be permbanned, time to stop blaming the system and shape up.

Yeah they escalate punishments for "hatespeech" and encouraging suicide. It goes 10 game CR, 25 game CR, 14 day suspension, permaban. There is no 3 day ban. So you got escalated to a 14 day ban. Carefulfrom here on out because next step is perma and theyre gonna be super strict on you. I recommend utilizing that mute button. Also i dont get why youre talking about 8 mile lol, that has nothing to do with this. (Great movie though)
